description: Combining two of their favorite materials, the Micro D® and Houdini®, Patagonia created a lightweight fleece that provides everyday warmth and comfort.
name: Patagonia Microdini Hoody - Mens

specs.value: 1.2-oz 100% recycled nylon ripstop with a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
